name: Clash Of Bulldozers
description:
One of the best action games ever: Get ready for an exciting and full of action game in beautiful arena.
Clash Of Bulldozers is addicting and unpredictably-brilliant Demolition derby game in one of the unlikeliest of arenas.
Reminiscent of classic Demolition Derby game this retro virtual fighting activity requires quick tapping reflexes, and the fighting ability to kick off your enemies, one-by-one. Going on an all-out offensive might not be the best idea against so many opponents; you have to be strategically smart in how you attack and defend.
